  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_sl/130379</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130379</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sinhrotron</string>
            <string language="en">Synchrotron accelerator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synchrotrongaspedal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Accélérateur de synchrotron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Accelerator do synchrotron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acceleratore del sincrotrone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συντομογραφία σύγχροτρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acelerador del sincrotrón</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Delovanje pospeševalnika delcev in prikaz uporabe magnetnega in električnega polja.</string>
            <string language="en">Basic principles of particle accelerator and how does it use electric and magnetic forces that are acting on charged particle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sinhrotron</string>
            <string language="en">synchrotron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pospeševalnik delcev</string>
            <string language="en">particle accelerator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundprinzipien des Partikelgaspedals und wie es 
die elektrischen und magnetischen Kräfte aufwendet, die auf 
belastetem Partikel fungieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Principes de base d'accélérateur de particules 
et comment il utilise les forces électriques et magnétiques qui 
agissent sur la particule chargée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Princípios básicos do accelerator da partícula
e como usa as forças elétricas e magnéticas que estão agindo na 
partícula carregada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Principi di base dell'acceleratore della 
particella e come usa le forze elettriche e magnetiche che stanno 
comportandosi sulla particella caricata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι βασικές αρχές της συντομογραφίας μορίων και πώς 
αυτό χρησιμοποιούν τις ηλεκτρικές και μαγνητικές δυνάμεις που 
ενεργούν στο χρεωμένο μόριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Principios de base del acelerador de la 
partícula y cómo utiliza las fuerzas eléctricas y magnéticas que 
están actuando en partícula cargada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synchrotron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikelgaspedal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">synchrotron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">accélérateur de particules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
